title: Review Vendor Design Document
description: A vendor has submitted a design drawing for a custom-built piece of equipment. An engineer must review it to ensure it meets project specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the vendor's submitted drawing and the project's technical specification for the equipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up both the vendor drawing and the internal specification document.

tasks.description: Compare the vendor's design against the specification requirements (e.g., material of construction, dimensions, power requirements).
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer reviews the documents and finds a discrepancy in the specified motor size.

tasks.description: Reject the drawing, add a comment detailing the discrepancy, and return it to the vendor for revision.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent formally rejects the document in the system, providing clear feedback to the vendor.
